definitions: A hard crystalline metamorphic form of limestone, typically white with coloured mottlings or streaks, which may be polished and is used in sculpture and architecture.
Used figuratively to refer to something with the smoothness, hardness, or colour of marble.
A small ball of coloured glass or similar material used as a toy.
A game in which marbles are rolled along the ground with the aim of hitting those of one's opponent.
